By Lisa Shock on Thursday, April 17, 2008 - 11:03 am:

By Anonymous on Monday, April 28, 2008 - 12:37 am:

By GM on Monday, April 28, 2008 - 06:44 am:

You'll have to be a bit more specific than that.

By Lisa Shock on Monday, April 28, 2008 - 11:04 am:

-As in having conducted a study where you wrote down results, so that you'd have some actual evidence to show the world, rather than challenging us (a violation of site policy) to do your research for you.

To have a conclusive answer, one would have to test each of the main breeds in each Hard Work at least 100 times in different weeks -no resetting. Then, there would be the usual random additional tests with mixed breed monsters.

I personally would love to see your recorded data showing the dates you worked on each monster type and the drills you ran. It must have taken years of daily work, and hundreds of pages of record keeping. Too bad you refuse to actually publish any concrete facts.

BTW, Moderators can see who is posting as Anonymous, and it's just as easy to ban them as a regular user. So I suggest you start posting those charts, or stop posting.

By Anonymous on Monday, May 5, 2008 - 01:34 am:
